Services can have domain specific methods but they must be able to run Execute(TCommand) and Execute<T>(TCommand) and that should be able to run any of the methods available in the domain. Additionally All services in a domain must have the same method public method signatures

Services can have domain specific methods but they must be able to run Execute(TCommand) and Execute<T>(TCommand) and that should be able to run any of the methods available in the domain. Additionally All services in a domain must have the same method public method signatures. tests are in the tests folder, one per project in src that has the .Tests suffix appended to the name. Tests should be written using xunit.v3, shouldly and moq unless mocking requires more complex mocking. All untestable code should be decorated with the ExcludeFromCodeCoverage attribute and the xml documentation should have the reason for exclusion <ExcludedFromCoverage>with the reason</ExcludedFromCoverage>
